messages.message:
Hi all! I'm merging a change to switch quite a few Dockerfiles over to the Go build (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/72370) (off Bazel). I've tested this extensively in both ArgoCD and DM sandboxes, so I don't anticipate problems. I am also going to monitor the next aihub-sandbox deployment. But if there are problems, and you see them before me, let me know!

:ty:

Services Affected:

admiral
alertops-service
connector-azblobstore
connector-confluence
connector-gdrive
connector-onedrive
connector-s3
connector-sharepoint
control-plane
core-platform-service
dbtools
envoy-proxy
file-service
job-service
license-service
mesh-manager
obs-manager
ocr-service
post-install-action-aihub-license
post-install-action-base-model-upload
post-install-action-dm-db-truncate
post-install-action-example
post-install-action-license
post-install-action-ml-studio-config-setup
post-install-action-refresh-connector-config
post-install-action-retention-rules
post-install-action-seed-connectors
post-install-action-solution-dashboard-consistency
post-install-action-system-repo-setup
post-install-action-system-tests-runner
post-install-action-test-runner
post-install-action-test-runner-setup
rabbitmq-ha
search-tservice
stats-collector
upgrade-tracker
weaviate

Hey @mfichman
Seeing below problems in sandboxes
1. PIA DM DB Truncate PIA doesn't need envoy, so it stuck waiting on envoy connection. Link (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/CCY413CSU/p1753769240309039?thread_ts=1753761647.753869&cid=CCY413CSU)
2. Crafting sandboxes are reporting RabbitMQ boot failure. Link (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/CCY413CSU/p1753770585596859?thread_ts=1753747269.658679&cid=CCY413CSU)
